duties_responsibilities.duty: Research grant funding prospects aligned with organization's priorities and develop relationships with funders.
Write and submit funding proposals and reports for private and government grants.
Maintain relationships with funding contacts and ensure timely acknowledgment of gifts.
Support grants management by checking in regularly with program leads and finance team.
Maintain database records on grant prospects, submissions, and deliverables.
Review and proofread development materials prepared by other staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in relevant field (Master's preferred)
